about_the_game:
ChessBlaze is a strategy game based on Chess but with a major twist:

TURNS DO NOT EXIST!

Chess is a great game but with today's average attention span, nobody wants to wait 3 minutes for the next move of their opponent.

Who needs turns if you can have energy instead! Every move costs energy, which is replenished over time! No need to wait for your opponent's response.

ChessBlaze turns slow-paced chess matches into action packed battlefield where every second can turn the situation 180 or even 360 degrees.

To spice things up even more, some game-modes feature „PowerTiles” which grant unique special abilities for lucky pieces that will manage to enter them!  Be careful though as the enemy will probably expect you to go exactly there and might have already prepared a massive counterattack

You can play the game with friends or try your best against players around the world.

Customize your gameplay with many free and achievement skins of Chessboard and Pieces that are added every update!

ChessBlaze offers many diverse game-modes with new ones coming in the future updates:

  • Normal

Basic Game-mode without any additional rules outside of the ones mentioned above . To win you need to either wipe all opponent pieces from the board or have more value in yours after time is up

  • Classic.

PowerTiles are disabled therefore gameplay is similar to classic chess. To win you need to capture the enemy king or have more value in yours after the time is up

(obviously, the concept of turns is still nonexistent)

  • Madness

Everything is FASTER! For true Multitasking monsters and people with machine-level reflexes

In game-modes featuring PowerTiles, each piece has its own ability to gain for stepping on said tiles. Power can be activated whenever you want afterwards.

  • Pawn - Explodes tiles around him with short delay

  • Rook - Places barrier that will prevent any piece from entering the designated tile

  • Knight - Teleports to any non-occupied tile on the chessboard

  • Bishop - Fires laser-beam in designated direction capturing all enemy pieces that wont manage to dodge it in time

  • Queen - For few seconds creates a zone in designated area so every piece inside of it is impossible to be captured

  • King - If you manage to protect him for the next 15 seconds, then you instantly win the game!
